oldPrefixUsed.title: Slash Commands Update
description: {{COM:bot.name}} now uses **Slash Commands**! Try it by typing `/{{COM:commands.help}}`!
If you don't see any slash commands listed for {{COM:bot.name}}:
1. Check that you have the **Use Application Commands** permission in this channel.
2. Try kicking and [re-inviting {{COM:bot.name}}]({{COM:links.invite}}).
3. Join our [support server]({{COM:links.support}}) for help.
I don't have all permissions required to run that command here! Please check the server and channel permissions to make sure I have the following permissions.
Required permissions: {{PERMISSIONS}}

setupRequired.title: Setup Required!
setupRequired.description: Please run basic setup with `/setup` before using that command!

premiumRequired.title: Premium Required!
description: This command requires this server to have premium!

fields.name: Premium Commands
value: Subscribe to **{{REF:bot.name}} Premium** for access to our premium features!

voteRequired.title: Vote Required!
description: This command requires you to have voted in the past 24 hours!

footer.text: Don't want to vote? Disable voting for the whole server with {{REF:bot.name}} Premium!

invalidTimezone.title: Time Zone Setup - {{TARGET}}
description: Invalid time zone!
To find your time zone please use the [map time zone picker]({{REF:links.map}})!

invalidTimeZoneAbbreviation.title: Time Zone Setup - {{TARGET}}
description: Invalid time zone! Do not use timezone abbreviations!
To find your time zone please use the [map time zone picker]({{REF:links.map}})!
I don't have permission to send messages in {{CHANNEL}}!
Please allow me to **View Channel**, **Send Messages**, **Embed Links**, and **Add Reactions** in {{CHANNEL}}.

roleHierarchyError.title: Role Hierarchy Error!
description: The birthday role must be below {{BOT}}'s role.
Additional Note: {{BOT}}'s role must be higher than the users it is assigning the birthday role to.
Example Role Hierarchy:
`{{COM:bot.name}}'s Role`
`Birthday Role`
`Birthday User's Highest Role`
Essentially the bot is unable to give a role to someone with a higher role than them or give a role that is higher than the bot's.

birthdayRoleUsedWarning.title: Warning
birthdayRoleUsedWarning.description:
We have detected that __**{{AMOUNT}}**__ user(s) already have that role!
The Birthday Role should ONLY be the role that users GET on their birthday!

footer.text: The Bot removes the Birthday Role from users whose birthday it isn't!

birthdayRoleUsedError.title: Error
birthdayRoleUsedError.description:
We have detected that __**{{AMOUNT}}**__ users already have that role!
The Birthday Role should ONLY be the role that users GET on their birthday!

footer.text: The Bot removes the Birthday Role from users whose birthday it isn't!

duplicateUserCustomMessage.title: Caution
description: There is already a {{TYPE}} custom message set for this user, would you like to overwrite it?
**Current Message**: {{CURRENT_MESSAGE}}
**New Message**: {{NEW_MESSAGE}}

invalidColor.title: Invalid Color
description: Please provide a valid hex color! Find hex colors [here]({{COM:links.colors}}).
Example: `Orange` or `Crimson`
Example: `#4EEFFF` or `4EEFFF`

maxFreeCustomMessages.description: Your server has reached the maximum amount of custom {{TYPE}} messages! (**{{FREE_MAX}}**)

footer.text: To have up to {{PAID_MAX}} custom {{TYPE}} messages try {{REF:bot.name}} Premium!

maxPaidCustomMessages.description: Your server has reached the maximum amount of custom {{TYPE}} messages! (**{{PAID_MAX}}**)

maxCustomMessageSize.description: Custom Messages are maxed at {{MAX_SIZE}} characters!

description: Please include the `{{REF:placeHolders.users}}` placeholder somewhere in the message. This indicates where the member names will appear.
Ex: `/message {{REF:types.add}} {{TYPE}} {{EXAMPLE_MESSAGE}}`
Please include the `{{REF:placeHolders.server}}` placeholder somewhere in the message. This indicates where the server name will appear.
Ex: `/message {{REF:types.add}} {{REF:types.serverAnniversary}} {{REF:defaults.serverAnniversaryMessage}}`
Tip: You can also use the `{{REF:placeHolders.year}}` placeholder for the anniversary year.

userSpecificMessagesNeedsPremium.title: {{REF:terms.premiumRequired}}
userSpecificMessagesNeedsPremium.description: User-specific messages are a premium only feature! View information about **{{REF:bot.name}} Premium** using `/premium`!

messageDoesNotExist.title: Test Custom Message
description: Message does not exist!
View your server's custom messages with `/message list <type>`!

errorEmbeds.devOnlyCommand: This command can only be used by developers.
errorEmbeds.serverOnlyCommand: This command can only be used in a server.
errorEmbeds.missingUserPerms: You don't have permission to run that command!
errorEmbeds.viewUserInDm: You cannot request another user's information in a DM!
errorEmbeds.memberAnniversaryInDM: You cannot view member anniversaries in a DM!
errorEmbeds.suggestBirthdayInDM: You can't set another person's birthday in a DM!
errorEmbeds.cantSuggest: You don't have permission to suggest another user's birthday!
errorEmbeds.cantSuggestForBot: You can't suggest a birthday for a bot!
errorEmbeds.noBirthdaysInServer: No one has set their birthday in this server! :(
errorEmbeds.noUpcomingMemberAnniversaries: There are no upcoming member anniversaries!
errorEmbeds.serverTimezoneNotSet: This server doesn't have a default timezone set! The anniversary system requires one to be set!
errorEmbeds.birthdayRoleManaged: Birthday Role cannot be managed by an external service!
errorEmbeds.attemptsLeft: That user has not used any attempts!
errorEmbeds.timezoneAbbreviation: Please do not use timezone abbreviations! Please try again.
errorEmbeds.rawAPIInteractionDataReceived: Please reinvite the bot with the guild scope. Join the support server for more support.
errorEmbeds.cooldownHit: You can only run this command {{AMOUNT}} time(s) every {{INTERVAL}}. Please wait before attempting this command again.
errorEmbeds.alreadyInBlacklist: That {{TYPE}} is already in the blacklist!
errorEmbeds.notInBlacklist: That {{TYPE}} is not in the blacklist!
errorEmbeds.alreadyInTrustedRole: That {{ROLE}} is already a trusted role!
errorEmbeds.emptyTrustedRole: The trusted role list is empty!
errorEmbeds.notInTrustedRole: That {{TYPE}} is not in the trusted role list!

errorEmbeds.marDuplicateYear: There is already a member anniversary role set for year {{YEAR}}!
errorEmbeds.marMaxPaid: Member anniverasry roles are capped at {{PAID_MAX}}!
errorEmbeds.emptyMar: The member anniversary role list is empty!
errorEmbeds.notInMar: There isn't a member anniversary role for that year!
errorEmbeds.duplicateMessage: Duplicate message found for this server!
errorEmbeds.noDefaultUserSpecificMessages: There aren't default user specific messages! Please specify once and trying again!

footers.whyPremium: Premium helps us support and maintain the bot!
footers.joinSupport: Please join our support server if you have any questions.
